title: NEWLY RENOVATED Studio Apt in a Charming Courtyard-style Building
posting_body: Tour our charming courtyard-style building with lush landscaping leading to this sunny 1st-floor unit.
This quiet and beautiful unit features hardwood-style flooring, 1950's style built-in shelves, updated fixtures throughout, vintage tile, and lots of storage space!
- Warner Bros Studios are across the street
- Close to the local neighborhood coffee shops (Priscilla's, Starbucks)
- Grocery shopping at nearby Trader Joe's, Vons
- Local restaurants include The Smokehouse, Olive & Thyme, Ciao Cristina!, Chipotle, Don Cuco's Mexican Restaurant, Malbec, Forman's, and Bob's Big Boy
- Conveniently located between Burbank and Hollywood
Located in a quiet neighborhood right off of N. Pass Ave., and steps from Toluca Lake's premier street for entertainment, this apartment gets the best of both worlds!
Explore Riverside Drive and discover the many nearby restaurants, coffee shops, bars, banks, UPS, USPS, grocers like Trader Joe's, and so much more!
*Please note this unit has NO PARKING*
*Pets allowed with extra monthly fee: Cats $50 / Dogs $50 (with some breed restrictions)*
To APPLY NOW or see more of our amazing apartments, please visit our website <URL>
Please note that the occupancy limit is 3 occupants for a 1 bedroom unit; income must be 3x the rent; we do not "hold" units for more than 10 days without an approved app and deposit.
